name: Bavarian Cream
steps: Beat eggs till thick and lemon colored. Gradually add sugar and continue to beat.
Pour hot milk over egg mixture and stir constantly.
Place above mixture in a double-boiler and cook over boiling water, stirring constantly till mixture thickens slightly and coats spoon (about 5 minutes). Remove from heat.
Soak gelatin in milk. When dissolved, stir into mixture. Chill till about the consistency of whipped cream. Fold into the whipped cream.
